input: As per the Constitution of india, the Writ of Prohibition relates to an order: (CDS 2016-I) P. issued against judicial and quasi judicial authority Q. to prohibit an inferior Court from proceeding in a particular case where it has no jurisdiction to try R. to restrain a person from holding a public office to when he is not entitled Select the correct answer using the code given below :
explanation: A Writ of prohibition is issued primarily to prevent an inferior court from exceeding its jurisdiction, or acting contrary to the rule of natural justice. The writ lies only against a body exercising public functions of a judicial or quasi-judicial character.
